ygData.subject: Re: Dwarven Cleric
ygData.msgSnippet: I see where you are going with this.... Ok, so if I want to spend the whole game using my trade skill, I could do that, I suppose.... I d rather hunt and get
ygData.messageBody:
I see where you are going with this.... Ok, so if I want to spend the
whole game using my trade skill, I could do that, I suppose.... I'd
rather hunt and get items, and explore, etc.... But I see your point.
I guess my assumption was that this was done during the normal course
of activities. Ok, so if I wanted to spend all day long on smithing
or pottery, or hell, even fishing, then I guess I could do that.

Well, I'm on the test server, and with 300 people, I'm not sure I
could really make that much money. Besides, it's more a family-type
community there, and people tend to give things away, more than sell
them. At least I do. Like giving away my Shining Star of Light....



>From: AoS/Aosinator <darshan@...>
>
> >What do you mean, in an intelligent manner?
>
>Have ye ever considered starting a trade business of some kind? Perhaps
>running errands for other players? Smithing, Jewelcrafting, things that
>you recycle your money into that will yeild more than what ye started with?
